mapper.select: SELECT * from menu_info where isdelete=0 and parentid =#{pid} and nodetype = #{nodeType} and id in( select DISTINCT rolemenu_info.mid from rolemenu_info,employrole_info where employrole_info.rid=rolemenu_info.rid and rolemenu_info.rid in (select employrole_info.rid from employ,employrole_info where employ.empid=employrole_info.empid and employ.empid=#{empid}) )

SELECT menucode from menu_info where isdelete=0 and nodetype = #{nodeType} and id in( select DISTINCT rolemenu_info.mid from rolemenu_info,employrole_info where employrole_info.rid=rolemenu_info.rid and rolemenu_info.rid in (select employrole_info.rid from employ,employrole_info where employ.empid=employrole_info.empid and employ.empid=#{empid}) )
select * from menu_info where isdelete=0 and parentid =#{pid} and nodetype = #{nodeType}
select m.id from menu_info m left join rolemenu_info rm on m.id = rm.mid where rm.rid =#{rid} and isdelete=0

select path,nodetype,menucode,level,name,iconurl,id,sort,linkurl,isdelete,parentid from menu_info
and isdelete=0 and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
